title: Apple patched this week—how are your systems? Lastpass working on a patch for an undescribed bug (said to be complex). What IT staff actually work on. And a long talk about emerging Administration cyber policy.
description: In today's podcast, we hear about Apple's patches issued this week—how are your systems? Lastpass is working on a patch for an undescribed bug (said to be a complicated one). What IT staff actually work on. Politico's Eric Geller discusses emerging Trump Administration cyber policy. Emily Wilson from Terbium Labs outlines the data breach timeline.
itunes:author: CyberWire, Inc.
itunes:subtitle: Apple patched this week—how are your systems? Lastpass working on a patch for an undescribed bug (said to be complex). What IT staff actually work on. And a long talk about emerging Administration cyber policy.
